Description: The number of stories created about your Page (Stories)

The number of people sharing stories about your page ('People Talking About This' / PTAT). These stories include liking your Page, posting to your Page's Wall, liking, commenting on or sharing one of your Page posts, answering a Question you posted, RSVPing to one of your events, mentioning your Page, phototagging your Page or checking in at your Place
The number of stories about your Page's stories, by Page story type
The number of people talking about your Page's stories, by Page story type

The number of People Talking About the Page by user city
The number of People Talking About the Page by user country
The number of People Talking About the Page by user language
The number of stories generated about your Page post ('Stories')
The number of unique people who created a story about your Page post ('People Talking About This' / PTAT)
The number of stories created about your Page post, by action type
The number of unique people who created a story about your Page post, by action type
The total number of impressions seen of any content associated with your Page
The number of people who have seen any content associated with your Page
The number of impressions of a Sponsored Story or Ad pointing to your Page
Number of people who saw a sponsored story or Ad about your Page
The number of times your posts were seen in News Feed or Ticker or on visits to your Page. These impressions can be Fans or non-Fans
The number of people who visited your Page, or saw your Page or one of its posts in News Feed or Ticker. These impressions can be Fans or non-Fans

The number of impressions of a story published by a friend about your Page. These stories include liking your Page, posting to your Page's Wall, liking, commenting on or sharing one of your Page posts, answering a Question you posted, RSVPing to one of your events, mentioning your Page, phototagging your Page or checking in at your Place

The number of people who saw your Page or one of its posts from a story published by a friend. These stories include liking your Page, posting to your Page's Wall, liking, commenting on or sharing one of your Page posts, answering a Question you posted, RSVPing to one of your events, mentioning your Page, phototagging your Page or checking in at your Place
